title: LightPath
description: This element holds a description of the Light Path associated with the Acquisition of this Channel.

subCategoriesOrder.LightPath: This element holds a description of the Light Path associated with the Acquisition of this Channel.
subCategoriesOrder.LightSourceCoupling: This empty element refers to a LightSourceCoupling component used in this Ligth Path.
subCategoriesOrder.ExcitationFilter: This field refers to an available Excitation Filter which is part of this Filter Cube.
subCategoriesOrder.StandardDichroic: This field refers to an available Dichroic Mirror which is part of this Filter Cube.
subCategoriesOrder.EmissionFilter: This field refers to an available Emission Filter which is part of this Filter Cube.
subCategoriesOrder.GenericFilter: This empty element refers to any additional Generic Filter component placed in this Light Path.
subCategoriesOrder.Aperture: This refers to an available Optical Aperture which is part of this Optical Assembly.
subCategoriesOrder.OpticalAssembly: This empty element refers to an Optical Assembly component placed in this Light Path.
subCategoriesOrder.PolarizationOptics: This empty element refers to a PolarizationOptics component placed in this light path.
